Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the Congress is contesting the lowest number of seats ever in a general election in 2019. This is an exaggeration because there have been instances in the past where the Congress has contested fewer seats.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a statement made by Prime Minister Narendra Modi in an interview. There is no additional evidence or data provided to support this claim.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided by Congress leader Ahmed Patel, who stated that the claim is false and that the Congress is not contesting its lowest ever seats. This alternative explanation suggests that the claim may be inaccurate.
